question: First ever radish crop has been grown in space by which organisation?
explanation:
NASA astronaut Kate Rubins has for the first-time harvested radish crop at the International Space Station.
This is a part of NASAâ€™s planet experiment named Plant Habitat-02 (PH-02), which is aimed to understand the plant growth in micro gravity conditions. The crops have been harvested in a time of 27 days.
